title: Cleaning Dustpan & Brush
description: Easy clip-on handle – Hold the brush and dustpan together for storage; the dustpan edge is serrated to allow easy scraping off the hair without entanglement. High-quality bristles – no burr damage, no scratches, thick and durable, comfortable to remove dust and smaller particles.
